name: delimiter-mismatch-testing
description: User reports feature broken, investigation reveals delimiter mismatch between components and missing test coverage
why_its_good: Real debugging loop that succeeded through testing discipline
Non-obvious root cause: code worked in isolation, failed in integration
Tests passed because functions weren't tested (silent gap)
Clear action: 24 regression tests added as fix

engineering: Different delimiters in different code parts (pipe vs tab)
Logs showed success but user experience showed failure
meta: Untested code works until it doesn't
Test coverage gaps are blind spots in design
Why it worked within tests reveals what tests don't cover

expected_detection.should_identify: Architecture fragility from implicit contract (delimiter format)
expected_detection.should_cite: Delimiter mismatch: pipe in scripts vs tab in menu
expected_detection.should_propose: Add integration tests, enforce contracts explicitly

eval_criteria.recall: Must mention delimiter/contract mismatch and testing gap
eval_criteria.precision: Should not focus on the feature itself but the systemic issue
eval_criteria.signal_detection: Should catch the 'why it worked within tests' meta-insight
